title: the link
body: The website where you can normally use sign up for the PBE seems to be down, do any of you know whats going on with the website and if so, when it will be resolved. {{summoner:1}}

replies.body: Yup, we're aware!  It's a recent issue that's being investigated.  I don't have any updates or news to offer currently, but I'll be keeping an eye out.  Hang tight!
